summary: Tested new i18n and chat features for Monacap Trading Pro. Language selector works (4 languages), chat widget works, login works, real-time crypto prices work. One issue found: i18n translations not applied to Home page content (hardcoded text).

ui_bugs.issue: i18n translations not applied - hero text and other content is hardcoded in English, does not change when language is switched

action_items: Update Home.jsx to use useTranslation hook and t() function for all text content
Apply i18n translations to other pages (Stocks, MirrorTrading, Company, Contact, etc.) if not already done
critical_code_review_comments: Home.jsx does not import or use useTranslation hook - all text is hardcoded
i18n locale files are properly set up with translations for en, es, fr, ar
LanguageSelector component correctly changes i18n.language and sets RTL direction for Arabic
seed_data_creation: Created test user during registration test
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested: Language selector (EN/ES/FR/AR) works and switches correctly including RTL for Arabic. Chat widget opens, shows welcome message, responds to user messages with predefined answers. Login with admin credentials works and redirects to /admin. Dashboard shows real-time BTC/USD prices from CoinGecko with live chart. All content pages load correctly. ISSUE: Home page text does not translate when language is changed - needs useTranslation hook implementation.
